name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Restore Tabs - Save, Delete, Restore tabs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Restore - Restore your tabs even if you turn off your computer and then you can restore them

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Restore Tabs - Seamless Browser Session Manager

Description:

"Restore Tabs is a versatile browser extension designed to streamline your online activities. It offers an easy and efficient way to save, manage, and restore your browser tabs. Whether you're diving into extensive research, comparing multiple shopping options, or switching between projects, Restore Tabs keeps your browsing sessions organized and accessible.

Key features:

Save Tabs: With a simple click, Restore Tabs allows you to save all your open tabs. This function is perfect for preserving your browsing sessions when you're conducting research, comparing shopping options, or working on different tasks.

Re-open Tabs: Need to return to a previous browsing session? Restore Tabs has you covered. Just click on the Re-open Tabs function, and you're back to your saved session instantly.

Remove Registered Tabs: Done with a particular browsing session? The Remove Registered Tabs function lets you clear away saved tabs you no longer need, keeping your saved sessions organized and clutter-free.


Comming Soon:

Manage Your Tabs: Restore Tabs provides a straightforward interface to manage your saved sessions. You can rename, delete, or reorder your saved tab groups according to your preferences.

Automatic Saving: Set Restore Tabs to automatically save your tabs at regular intervals. This feature ensures that you never lose your work due to sudden shutdowns or crashes.

Sync Across Devices: With Restore Tabs, your browsing sessions are always within reach. Save your tabs on one device and restore them on another, keeping your sessions synchronized.

Restore Tabs - making your browsing experience more organized, efficient, and enjoyable."
